CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1,4 Recently , power conversion efficiency higher than 7% for BHJ polymer solar cells has been achieved by several groups through the developing of new polymer donor materials with the use of [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC61BM ) or [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as electron acceptors.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM)
2. [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PC61BM
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the table with the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PC61BM |
| PC71BM |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1,4 Recently , power conversion efficiency higher than 7% for BHJ polymer solar cells has been achieved by several groups through the developing of new polymer donor materials with the use of [6,6]-phenyl-C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC61BM ) or [6,6]phenyl-C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as electron acceptors.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. 7% - the power conversion efficiency achieved by several groups.
2. [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM) - a polymer donor material used to achieve high power conversion efficiency.
3. [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) - another polymer donor material used to achieve high power conversion efficiency.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of a material property:

1. 7% - the power conversion efficiency achieved by several groups.

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM) and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM), are materials that have been used to achieve high power conversion efficiency, but they are not directly referring to a specific value of a material property.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the valid entity presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 7% |

The table shows the single entity that refers to a specific value of a material property, which is the power conversion efficiency of 7%.
